short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with friends and challenge them to find out who the greatest Wordler is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Wordle experience with WordleScoreSync, your gateway to connecting and competing with fellow Wordle enthusiasts. Immerse yourself in captivating challenges that crown the ultimate Wordler – the player with the fewest guesses during a challenge's chosen timeframe. Select from challenge durations of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks, and let the battle of words begin! 🏆 Experience the thrill of:

    • real-time opponent scores ⏱️ (no need for texting or sharing your 
       results on social media)
    • engage in multiple challenges simultaneously 💪
    • access daily time statistics 📊
    • showcase your prowess with the fastest Wordle game time stat 🚀

Additionally, monitor your Invitation History and Challenge History to savor the journey of competition and camaraderie. 🌟

How to use:
- Register for the extension by providing you name, note your provided user ID
- Challenge another user by clicking the challenge icon in the lower left corner and provide their 
  user ID. Set the "challenge duration" and click 'Challenge'.
